titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Charles H. Irby Papers, 1962-1975

Department of Special Collections and University Archives
Stanford University Libraries
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1999 The Board of Trustees of Stanford University. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Charles H. Irby Papers,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Charles H. Irby Papers, M0671, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Primarily correspondence, memos, working notes and technical reports from work on ARPANET, Control Meta Language, Modular Programming System and software and interface applications while Irby was at SRI International and Xerox Park.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.corpname: Stanford Research Institute. Augmentation Research Center.
United States. Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency Software and Intelligent Systems Technology Office.
University of Southern California. Information Sciences Institute.
controlaccess.subject: Control Meta Language.
Distributed Programming System.
Information storage and retrieval systems.
Modular Programming System.
Operating System Module.
Science--History.
Software engineering.
User interfaces (Computer systems)
